name: 李文興
objective:
課程內容包含：智慧演算法基本用法及介紹、資料分析、迴歸方法、系統元件數值模建立、數值計算方法、系統性能模擬及數值佳化方法。
These course contents include: basic usage and introduction to intelligent algorithms, data analysis, regression methods, numerical model establishment for system components, numerical computation methods, and system performance simulation and numerical optimization methods.
schedule:
1.	課程評分公告
2.	智慧演算法基本用法
3.	粒子族群演算法教學
4.	隨機森林演算法教學
5.	資料回歸分析使用
6.	系統元件架構運算
7.	數值分析
1.	Course Grade Announcement  
2.	Basic Usage of Intelligent Algorithms 
3.	Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO) Algorithm Tutorial
4.	Random Forest Algorithm Tutorial
5.	Application of Data Regression Analysis
6.	System Component Architecture Computation
7.	Numerical Analysis
scorePolicy:
Midterm exam 30%
Final exam 30%
General. Performance and reports 40%
